programme.title: Good Life Club
programme.desc: Hosted by senior journalist Chang Ya-Fang, 'Good Life Club', a multi-camera talk show, presents the latest topics on healthy lifestyle, medical care, consumers’ information and fashion trends. With its in-death discussion by the expert and humorous conversation of the celebrity guests, 'Good Life Club' is aimed to offer the helpful guide to good life with the easy-to-understand approach.

programme.title: The World Hunter
programme.desc: There are still little-known primitive tribes in many corners of the world. People there live a life that’s isolated yet full of surprises. To satisfy your curiosity and help you understand the amazing life in these tribes, our manly, wise, brave host Atif Baig takes you to visit aborigine groups that are rare or with distinguishing features all over the world to learn about their customs and to experience their tribal life. Let’s start this unprecedented surviving game.

programme.title: HI!LET'S GO
programme.desc: Some people say that to travel well is to eat local food and enjoy the scenery around you; for others it’s all about shopping like crazy and chasing down new trends everywhere you go; and then there are the people who want to experience a location’s rich culture and history.

programme.title: 53 Days in the Africa
programme.desc: 53 Days in the Africa,'Record it in a different way, and take you to appreciate the days in Africa and enjoy different customs and customs together.

programme.title: Prince's Moving Castle
programme.desc: Come along with our host Dawson as he embarks on a new journey, taking the viewer on a ride, traveling in a new camping trailer into the wide-open spaces on the road. Come and see the real Dawson as he begins his journey in Germany, traveling the classic highways, then driving through Hokkaido, Japan, engaging in the local culture along the way, and ending up in our host’s hometown of New Zealand.

To satisfy your curiosity and help you understand the amazing life in these tribes, our manly, wise, brave host Atif Baig takes you to visit aborigine groups that are rare or with distinguishing features all over the world to learn about their customs and to experience their tribal life. Let’s start this unprecedented surviving game.

programme.title: Tang's Magic Trip
programme.desc: With the concept of ‘exotic and mysterious travels’ as the point of departure, _x000D_the most influential astrologist in the Chinese community, _x000D_Jesse Tang, will take us from India, the US, to France and finally Germany to _x000D_get our heads around horoscope connotations, inter-personal interaction and culture of _x000D_various countries, as well as introducing local gourmet food on live broadcast, _x000D_analyzing the volume/dynamics changes caused by travelling to a place,

programme.title: Prince's Moving Castle
programme.desc: Come along with our host Dawson as he embarks on a new journey, taking the viewer on a ride, traveling in a new camping trailer into the wide-open spaces on the road. Come and see the real Dawson as he begins his journey in Germany, traveling the classic highways, then driving through Hokkaido, Japan, engaging in the local culture along the way, and ending up in our host’s hometown of New Zealand.

programme.title: HI!LET'S GO
programme.desc: Some people say that to travel well is to eat local food and enjoy the scenery around you; for others it’s all about shopping like crazy and chasing down new trends everywhere you go; and then there are the people who want to experience a location’s rich culture and history.

programme.title: 53 Days in the Africa
programme.desc: 53 Days in the Africa,'Record it in a different way, and take you to appreciate the days in Africa and enjoy different customs and customs together.

programme.title: Good Life Club
programme.desc: Hosted by senior journalist Chang Ya-Fang, 'Good Life Club', a multi-camera talk show, presents the latest topics on healthy lifestyle, medical care, consumers’ information and fashion trends. With its in-death discussion by the expert and humorous conversation of the celebrity guests, 'Good Life Club' is aimed to offer the helpful guide to good life with the easy-to-understand approach.

programme.title: Pretty Little Liars
programme.desc: Satu malam, Sabrina hilang. Setahun berlalu, Hanna, Emma, Sabrina & Aria kembali dan telah diugut oleh "A" untuk dedahkan rahsia mereka.

programme.title: Penakluk Hati
programme.desc: Penakluk Hati mengisahkan tentang rumitnya perjalanan cinta Abadi (Jeff Smith) dan sisi kelam kehidupannya.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar The Movie
programme.desc: Filem komedi kekeluargaan mengisahkan kehidupan harian Haji Iskandar, isteri beliau, lima anak mereka dan keluarga masing-masing yang lucu dan huru-hara.

programme.title: Lawak Boss Boss
programme.desc: Bersama Zizan Razak dan CEO syarikat terkenal dan bagaimanakah mereka melakukan cabaran dan bermain permainan menarik?

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Benci
programme.desc: Semua wanita yang didekati Migo hanya untuk memenuhi keperluan pertaruhannya bersamai dengan rakan-rakan dan juga membuktikan dirinya sebagai playboy sejati.

programme.title: Malaysian Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Nusantara merupakan satu daerah yang tebal dengan semangat mistik dan alam ghaib. Setiap episod mempunyai penyelesaian yang unik bergantung kepada jenis gangguan, jenis jin dan kesan ke atas watak utama.

programme.title: Forensik
programme.desc: Ketua Pakar Lokasi Jenayah, Juliana Hamid menangani kes pembunuhan dan berusaha untuk jaga hubungan dengan Ins.Razali. Ayah Juliana, seorang pesara polis, berjuang untuk menyimpan rahsia yang tersembunyi.

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Benci
programme.desc: Semua wanita yang didekati Migo hanya untuk memenuhi keperluan pertaruhannya bersamai dengan rakan-rakan dan juga membuktikan dirinya sebagai playboy sejati.

programme.title: Ready, Set, Action!
programme.desc: Meneroka tempat ikonik yang pernah menjadi lokasi latar belakang adegan filem terkenal.

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Alisa yang cuba untuk menjejaki ibu kandungnya. Sepanjang perjalanan itu dia mengenali Raykal dan Shun. Siapakah di antara dua lelaki ini yang dapat memenangi hati Alisa?

programme.title: Kembara Chef Wan
programme.desc: Saksikan keletah Chef Wan dalam menyediakan pelbagai masakan menarik inspirasi dari serata dunia

programme.title: Sape Terer
programme.desc: Sape Terer merupakan 'game show' terbaharu yang mempertemukan artis otai dan artis baharu bersaing merebut gelaran juara setiap episod.

programme.title: Lockdown
programme.desc: Lockdown mengisahkan kehidupan masyarakat tempatan semasa PKP diumumkan. Pelbagai kisah menarik dan menghayat hati yang berlaku kepada sesetengah keluarga dan bersama-sama mengharungi suka duka semasa PKP.

programme.title: Pusing Pusing Hong Kong
programme.desc: Rancangan travelog yang menampilkan personaliti tv popular, melancong ke luar negara

programme.title: Unplugged Ria 2019
programme.desc: Unplugged 2019 menyaksikan persembahan santai dari artis-artis popular Malaysia.

programme.title: Jejak Jepun Jihan
programme.desc: Mengembara bersama Jihan Muse di negara matahari terbit. Nikmati keunikan dan realiti kehidupan masyarakat Jepun selain perkongsian info dan tips untuk mereka yang ingin bercuti ke sana.

programme.title: Tikam
programme.desc: NJ, Akma, Ed, Ika, Mike dan Sap menjumpai mayat Shahrol, mati bunuh diri di pejabat. Rupanya kegiatan pecah amanah mereka telah bocor dan di antara mereka adalah pengkhianat.

programme.title: Jodoh-Jodoh Annisa
programme.desc: Berkisarkan konflik keluarga dan percintaan. Annisa terpaksa menempuh jalan hidup yang berliku baik dalam kerjaya dan percintaan. Dugaan hidup memaksa Annisa memilih antara lima jejaka.

programme.title: Roti Cicah Susu
programme.desc: Empat orang anak yatim terpisah. Selepas 15 tahun, mereka bertemu semula dan cuba untuk mencari jawapan tentang apa yang berlaku sehingga membuka banyak rahsia yang tak sepatutnya diketahui.

programme.title: Cinta Tapi Benci
programme.desc: Semua wanita yang didekati Migo hanya untuk memenuhi keperluan pertaruhannya bersamai dengan rakan-rakan dan juga membuktikan dirinya sebagai playboy sejati.

programme.title: Aku Posmen
programme.desc: Usop bercita-cita menjadi askar kerana malu dengan keturunannya yang bekerja sebagai posmen namun akhirnya menjadi posmen selepas pinangannya ditolak oleh bapa Fauziah yang menghina kerjaya bapanya.

programme.title: Dee The Series
programme.desc: Dee bersama adik dan ibunya Amy, memulakan hidup baru di KL apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia baru untuk Dee yang penuh dengan muzik, gelak ketawa dan air mata.

programme.title: LePakNil
programme.desc: Jom lepak bersama Pak Nil setiap minggu berborak tentang berita terbaru dan perkembangan terkini artis dan selebriti pilihan.

programme.title: Jodoh-Jodoh Annisa
programme.desc: Berkisarkan konflik keluarga dan percintaan. Annisa terpaksa menempuh jalan hidup yang berliku baik dalam kerjaya dan percintaan. Dugaan hidup memaksa Annisa memilih antara lima jejaka.

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa

programme.title: Travel Like Local x Aussie
programme.desc: Setiap minggu dua selebriti akan menerokai tempat-tempat menarik dan unik di sekitar Australia.

programme.title: Chef S.O.S
programme.desc: Masak pelbagai jenis hidangan dengan bantuan tetamu setiap minggu melalui panggilan video.

programme.title: Unplugged Ria 2019
programme.desc: Unplugged 2019 menyaksikan persembahan santai dari artis-artis popular Malaysia.

programme.title: Kebun Urban
programme.desc: Razif akan menemuramah serta mencungkil rahsia petani-petani kecilan di Malaysia yang menanam sayuran dihalaman rumah mereka. Razif dan Sherson Lian akan memasak resipi ringkas menggunakan tanaman mereka.

programme.title: Fantasy Escape
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merealisasikan impian peminat bertuah untuk melakukan aktiviti yang mereka gemari bersama selebriti pilihan mereka yang turut berkongsi pengalaman dan memberi motivasi.

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: In the final episode, Steve looks back at his top Deadly Predators from the series and meets the ultimate predator. He reviews the biggest and best stunts from the series and reveals how the team bought a giant air vortex cannon to the Deadly junkyard to demonstrate the predatory prowess of the sperm whale.

programme.title: Deadly Predators
programme.desc: When it comes to weapons, snakes have some of the best on earth. Steve goes in search of the adder, and sets out to blow our minds by showing us the fastest snake on earth: the diamond rattlesnake.

programme.title: Extreme Treks
programme.desc: The central highlands of Iceland are otherworldly. Situated at an altitude of approx. 450 meters above sea level, the region experiences some of the most inhospitable weather on the planet.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK
programme.desc: Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode he returns to the wilds of Devon, to see the Mason family.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge
programme.desc: This challenge sees Robson head to Mexico for a competitive 'fish off' against locals.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: Graham Norton introduces another instalment of his trademark mix of cheeky celebrity chat and live music performances.

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Gretta has purchased part of a garden to design her a Malaysian-inspired single-storey, burnt wood and glass pavilion. Keeping it firmly in the family, brother-in-law Fernando also stepped into the role of project manager, despite zero building experience.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat
programme.desc: Nigella shares her go-to celebratory cake - a divine, layered chocolate and peanut butter cake that will make even die-hard haters of peanut butter relent.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars
programme.desc: This time, it's all about fast food as Gordon invites a secret panel of industry giants to help him in his search for Britain's best food or drink entrepreneur.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals
programme.desc: It's first week in a new heat and a new set of bakers are in for a tough challenge. First up they have to make Mont Blanc desserts with nothing more than a list of ingredients. Then they have to turn the trifle into a new exciting dessert complete with a standing showpiece sculpture.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back
programme.desc: This Italian restaurant, in Swedesboro, New Jersey, is in debt and serving dreadful food - some that would result in food poisoning. Gordon arrives to give the venue some much-needed culinary education.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler ​service.

programme.desc: The competition reaches its dramatic denouement as the final three sewers tackle celebration wear challenges and the series winner is crowned.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick's in Falmouth, seeing the seas around Cornwall which inspired author William Golding to write Lord of the Flies, and meets his daughter, Judy. programme.title: Go Jetters

programme.title: The Numtums
programme.desc: When Humpty Do wins a prize of 100 sherbet termites he decides to share them with his friends.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa‐Laa and Po follow a trail of flowers which leads them to some very special treasure.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen's brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen's home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: Commissioner Liu Ta-hua is arrested by special envoy Cheng Chih-cheng for corruption. Coolie Lin Szu-hai, who has unintentionally helped Cheng, is given a small post under Lo. Lin is smart and soon learns how to get dockside bribes. Later, he gets a regular spin-off from Adjutant Chang...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty's Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Everyone wants to win the annual Lion Dance Trophy, including Wong Fei Hung. His jealous rivals, led by Master Shen, try to frame Wong by placing a decomposed corpse in his Po Chi Lam clinic. This gives Lu Wei, a corrupted cop, the chance to pile Wong Fei Hung with various criminal charges. Will Wong be able to defeat his enemies once again?

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend's grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms" Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts World's intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called "The Venoms", and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: You Ni Cai You Jia
programme.desc: CCTV brings you broadcasts of finely-produced artistic dramas that closely follow the pulse of the times.

programme.title: You Ni Cai You Jia
programme.desc: CCTV brings you broadcasts of finely-produced artistic dramas that closely follow the pulse of the times.

programme.title: Nostalgia - Pian Duan Zhan Bo
programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling.

programme.title: Bond With China
programme.desc: This documentary presents wonderful stories of China and the world, showcasing the Chinese spirit, the development of China and the spread of Chinese culture.

programme.title: TV Guide
programme.desc: Stay tuned to CCTV-4 as we introduce you to the various content and programming on the channel.

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30-minute programme focusing on news about China and the world.

programme.title: Talk With Lujian
programme.desc: This programme interviews global influencers, outstanding overseas Chinese representatives, as well as domestic celebrities in various fields.

programme.title: China Showbiz
programme.desc: China Showbiz gathers a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through appreciation and review of these works.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: Universal Show
programme.desc: This programme invites outstanding artistes from all over the world - including those in music, dance, acrobatics, magic and other art forms - to perform with China's works of art to create a "cultural integration" platform.

programme.title: Across The Strait
programme.desc: Across The Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflecting the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and detailing the Chinese Government's policy of "one country, two systems".

programme.title: International Depth
programme.desc: An international news weekly review.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: Global News
programme.desc: Be updated with the latest news developments around the world.

programme.title: China's Public Opinion Field
programme.desc: This programme brings media professionals, commentators and online opinion leaders into the studio to express views on current issues.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: Advertisements
programme.desc: Stay tuned to CCTV-4 as we bring you the next programme.

programme.title: On The Way

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world._x000D__x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China._x000D__x000D_

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving individual stocks and how investors are reacting. CEOs, analysts and money managers explain their strategies, share opinions, and provide an inside perspective on breaking news stories.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy invites Terra to the Titan's Valentine's Day dance. She accepts in order to destroy all of the Titans and exact revenge on Beast Boy.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Despite Raven's warnings, Starfire showers love on the adorable twin destroyers of the universe.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Panda is a keen online dater, and when a lovely French woman matches with him and agrees to a video chat date, Panda wants to show the best side of himself.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven and Connie help Jamie the mailman with love.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: Team Tennyson travel to the new Laser Town VR.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Jake loses his powers to a witch.

programme.title: Rouge
programme.desc: Fleur is the blue angel in one of Hong Kong's bordellos and night clubs. She falls in love with "12th Master" Chan, the heir to a chain of pharmacies. They agree on a suicide pact and Fleur dies, but Chan is saved. 50 years later, Fleur's ghost appears in a newspaper office wanting to place an ad to find Chan, who never arrives in the afterlife.

programme.title: A Hero Never Dies
programme.desc: Jack and Martin admire each other, but they work for two different underworld bosses. During a fight in Thailand, Martin is crippled while Jack is seriously wounded. Both men are left behind by their bosses, and their girlfriends killed. It is time for the heroes to team up and fight back...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Xiao Zhuang is a professional killer who accidentally blinds a young nightclub singer Jenny in a gunfire action. He must quickly raise a lot of money for Jenny's corneal transplantation but his action draws the attention of a detective who is investigating the case. Will Xiao Zhuang be arrested and can Jenny restore her sight?

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China And America
programme.desc: Master Wong Fei Hung goes visit "Bucktooth" So in America. He lost his memory after falling into the valley to save 13th Aunt but is luckily rescued by an Indian tribe. As the western gangsters try to kill everyone living in the town, Master Wong fights to defend the Chinese compatriots there.

programme.title: Saga Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: In this sequel, the powerful Ashura wants to quit the evil world and asks Master Chi for help. He grants her seven days on earth, after which she must leave to live inside a statue. As demons keep harassing Ashura, she teams up with Peacock and Fruit on the seventh day to destroy them. This touches the gods, allowing her to transform into a human.

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kong's biggest stars

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: Her Fatal Ways
programme.desc: A Mainland Chinese inspector Cheng, and her assistant are tasked to extradite a drug dealer to Hong Kong. When the drug dealer escapes, they are forced to stay and assist Hong Kong police inspector Wu to find him. The China-Hong Kong cultural clash soon occurs, causing headaches for everyone and Cheng, a loyal member of the Chinese Communist Party.

programme.title: Police Story III Super Cop
programme.desc: Ka Kui goes undercover in a Chinese prison to investigate a gun trafficking case and befriends trafficker, Panther. A police officer helps them to escape from prison and works undercover with Ka Kui so as to earn the trust of Panther. However, their operation fails when Ka Kui's girlfriend accidentally reveals his true identity as a police officer...

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: A Chinese Tall Story
programme.desc: While finding ways to rescue his disciples, Monk Tripitaka meets the lizard imp Mei Yan, the ugliest woman alive. Despite the conflict between good and evil, he falls for Mei Yan who sacrifices herself to save him many times. The Monk breaks his "no killing" rule to save his disciples, and things get more complicated as Princess Galaxy appears...

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story II
programme.desc: The sequel continues the supernatural encounters of young student Ling Choi Son. After he befriends a young Taoist priest, they meet Windy, who bears a strong resemblance to Ling's beloved ghost Lip Siu Sin, and her sister Moon. Together, they team up to fight against evil spirits.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: The Lunatics
programme.desc: This classic Hong Kong movie is about a psychiatrist (Fung Shui Fan) who devotes his time to help the mentally ill people on the streets. Most of them are borderline insane and getting them back from the bottom of the society barrel is tough work. However, he had one successful case. The man has lived alone for one year after being declared healthy. However, this peace soon crumbles after he is denied from seeing his son....

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China
programme.desc: Amid foreign incursion, martial arts master Wong Fei Hung fights to defend his community against corrupt officials, local gangsters and a martial arts rival.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Eighth Happiness
programme.desc: A breakdown in the telephone system leads three brothers to find their love respectively. The eldest falls in love with a charming divorcee whom he dislikes initially. Hiding from his girlfriend, the flirtatious second brother falls in love with another gorgeous girl. The shy youngest brother is in love with a pretty girl he first met in a park.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in China III
programme.desc: Master Wong Fei Hung and his disciples enrol in the Lion Dance Martial Arts Contest and travels to Beijing by train from Foshan. They uncovered an assassination plot before the contest, and Master Wong has to stop the assassination while battling an arrogant and deceitful opponent.

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kang's home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kang's sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: A Moment Of Romance III
programme.desc: Air Force pilot Wai is hurt when he is forced to land in a village during battle. He is rescued and taken care of by Wo, and they fall in love despite the village chief's objection. As Wai returns home for a new mission, Wo comes looking for him and insists to wait for his return even with his death news, until Wai miraculously appears one day.

programme.title: Peacock King
programme.desc: Ashura, daughter of the King of Hell, is awakened by evil spirit Raga who brings her to modern day Tokyo to wreak havoc. With the key to Hell's Gate, Ashura can set her father free from imprisonment. Two young men, Peacock and Fruit, meet in Tokyo with the same mission to stop Ashura. They team up after knowing each other and becoming friends.

programme.title: The Lost Husband
programme.desc: Trying to put her life back together after her husband's death, Libby and her children move to her estranged aunt's goat farm in central Texas.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 15
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their self-made Lethal Weapon sequels have been pulled from the local library, the Gang decides to address their political incorrectness by making another film -- Lethal Weapon 7.

programme.title: The Art Scene
programme.desc: Is it the font, or is it the color or it's the layout which makes a great graphic design? How has graphic design evolved in advertising, in print papers to broadcast design in Singapore? So many questions and we are going to tell you all in this next episode of The Art Scene- The Art of Graphics.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals
programme.desc: The teams compete to make perfect batches of miniature classics - 24 conversations and 24 tartes aux fruits - as well as a reinvented Black Forest gateau.

programme.title: Films & Stars

programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Xiuhao invites Changshou and his wife to the office. In the presence of Chairman Pu and Jiangzhe, he kneels before all of them and seeks their forgiveness. He admits that he was the one who framed the Wus 5 years ago.

programme.title: I Will Find You A Better Home
programme.desc: (R) Fang Sijin finds out Qu Linglong is trying to marry Xu Wenchang in order to purchase an apartment in Shanghai. She suggests that Xu Wenchang makes use of his Shanghainese nationality to expand his business. Xu Wenchang suddenly confesses that he likes her.

programme.title: Once Again
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Jiaxi gets to know that Zhixun is learning judo from Xiaoxin and is very unhappy about it. Zhixun begs Jiaxi to allow him to continue learning the sport, so Jiaxi agrees reluctantly.

programme.title: Once Again
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Zhenglu confesses his love to Naxi. Kuizhen and Baoying happen to witness the scene and Kuizhen is stunned by what he saw.

programme.title: Tender Loving Food
programme.desc: We've got Penang Assam Laksa, Ragu Tagliatelle, Beef Lung Rendang. Or craving some desserts? We have Cinnamon Rolls, Taosu Cookies, and fancy cocktails, etc. Let's meet the individuals behind these delectable homemade comfort foods - budding home bakers and cooks, professional pizzaiolos and teenage masterchefs.

programme.title: Slumfood Millionaire
programme.desc: This unique documentary series celebrates the flavourful, and often unknown dishes made by talented cooks in the slums of Manila, Bangkok, Mumbai, Jakarta, Phnom Penh and Kota Kinabalu. Using cheap and overlooked ingredients, they cook up scrumptious dishes that are famous within the slums.

programme.title: Jirisan
programme.desc: (Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Seo Yi-Gang is the best ranger at Jiri Mountain National Park. She knows virtually everything about the area, including where to climb the mountain. Kang Hyun-Jo is a rookie ranger at Jiri Mountain National Park. He graduated from the military academy and was once an army captain. He has a secret that he can't tell anyone about. These two people become partners and they work to save people around Jiri Mountain National Park.

programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day.

programme.title: Rabbit Without Ears
programme.desc: Til Schweiger (Inglorious Bastards) directs and stars in this slick romantic comedy that was number 1 on the German box office in 2007. A reporter is at the mercy of the girl he used to bully in school while serving his probation at a daycare centre.

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Murder in the Old Country
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: Nanny On Board II: In South Africa
programme.desc: Henni, as the premium nanny, finds herself in a South African farm. Her employer is Konrad, a harsh grandfather. However, she soon discovers that beneath his cold exterior is a sensitive man with a wounded heart. She falls for him and things soon unravel.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland
programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.

programme.title: Bon Appetit
programme.desc: Set in a gourmet restaurant in Zurich, a kiss, an affair, an unexpected pregnancy and an explosive love triangle between the master chef and restaurant owner, his protégé and a lovely sommelier erupts.

programme.title: Rabbit Without Ears
programme.desc: Til Schweiger (Inglorious Bastards) directs and stars in this slick romantic comedy that was number 1 on the German box office in 2007. A reporter is at the mercy of the girl he used to bully in school while serving his probation at a daycare centre.

programme.title: Catch Of The Day
programme.desc: Alex, a driven young man, is forced to leave Hamburg for his small hometown to care for his sick father. With his finances running dry, he tries in vain to sell the family house and ends up resorting to hilarious measures to enhance its property value.

programme.title: A Fleeting Moment
programme.desc: There are no temporal boundaries to love. Entrapped by memories of a decade lost to them, two ex-lovers cross paths once again in their later years. And all it takes is a tiny, serendipitous moment for the sparks to fly once again.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas - jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Death In The Forest
programme.desc: A teacher and his class come across a body in the forest with artifacts from the local museum, killed in a medieval ritual which involves being tied up and hunted in a forest. Detectives Zeiler and Oberländer are called to investigate the brutal murder.

programme.title: Bon Appetit
programme.desc: Set in a gourmet restaurant in Zurich, a kiss, an affair, an unexpected pregnancy and an explosive love triangle between the master chef and restaurant owner, his protégé and a lovely sommelier erupts.

programme.title: Karnaval
programme.desc: Alis, a 36-year-old, who lives in his car after being kicked out from his parent’s house, finds himself selling carpet cleaners. Through the "Karnaval" brand of carpet cleaners, he meets Demet, an ambitious wedding cake maker.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel

programme.desc: There are no temporal boundaries to love. Entrapped by memories of a decade lost to them, two ex-lovers cross paths once again in their later years. And all it takes is a tiny, serendipitous moment for the sparks to fly once again.

programme.title: A Summer In Istria
programme.desc: Soccer Scout Anne heads to Istria, Croatia to be the maid of honor at her friend’s wedding. There, a talented 12-year-old player catches her attention, but she has no idea that his father was no other than her childhood sweetheart.

programme.title: Catch Of The Day
programme.desc: Alex, a driven young man, is forced to leave Hamburg for his small hometown to care for his sick father. With his finances running dry, he tries in vain to sell the family house and ends up resorting to hilarious measures to enhance its property value.

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas - jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Cookbook of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics - not least, bribing a TV chef to "steal" her heart through cooking.

programme.title: #Instalie
programme.desc: Laras is an influencer and Haikal, her faithful boyfriend cum photographer. Together, they’ve amassed a strong legion of adoring fans. However, their picture-perfect relationship is unexpectedly shattered when Haikal meets a mysterious lady at a party.

programme.title: I'm Losing It
programme.desc: When her fitness-obsessed boyfriend dumps her for a skinny girl, shy and chubby Anna resolves to slim down and win him back. But, with help from her plump health-nut buddy Nick, Anna discovers that true happiness is more than six-pack abs.

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Steve Carell is Maxwell Smart, a top-secret spy who blunders through every mission with Anne Hathaway, who stars as the sexy Agent 99.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.desc: With Marnie empowered by spirits of the dead, Bill issues an unpopular order to save vampires from the light. Elsewhere, Alcide and Debbie join a new pack.

programme.title: True Blood
programme.desc: As Marnie braces for a dangerous midnight face-off, Sookie and Eric pledge their allegiance to the King. Jason is torn between friendship and passion.

programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a survivor of a plane crash stranded on a desolate island who miraculously makes it back home after four years.

programme.title: Horizon Line
programme.desc: A couple flying on a small plane to attend a tropical island wedding must fight for their lives desperately after their pilot suffers a heart attack.

programme.desc: A group of 30 young men and women on a long, multi-generational expedition to colonise a distant planet, descend into chaos, reverting to their most primitive state of being..

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life Or Parole
programme.desc: Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a woman's death. Now 65, he believes he has demonstrated his rehabilitation.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder
programme.desc: After just 33 days of marriage, Mahmuda Khatun fatally stabbed her husband in the chest on his 28th birthday. What drove her to commit such a horrific act?

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.desc: In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered, but it isn't matched until 2018, when genetic genealogy helps point to one suspect.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: The story of the dedicated investigation into Christy Mirack's murder and how DNA and the Bloodline Detectives traced her killer.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime
programme.desc: A simple snack at a local restaurant turns violent when a grandmother is ripped off, but does not give up. A woman takes on the man who slammed into her van and then tried to run.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime
programme.desc: A brave grandma fights off two carjackers intent on stealing her truck, a woman stands up against heinous domestic violence, two assailants pull a gun on a store manager, and more.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When Sue Snow suddenly dies from cyanide poisoning, police think this may be just another random event. But a second victim indicates someone has a personal, malevolent motive.

programme.title: Killer In Plain Sight
programme.desc: When 17-year-old Missy Avila is found drowned in a woodland stream, police discover she has been beaten and her hair cut off. The investigation unravels a passionate story of rage, jealousy and betrayal.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers
programme.desc: When Darren Murphy saw his partner of less than three months, Olivia Dunlea, with another man, he stabbed the mother-of-three in the head and neck while she lay in bed.

programme.title: I Survived
programme.desc: A man high on PCP goes on the rampage, stabbing his 11-year-old daughter and viciously attacking and stabbing a neighbour and her son.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman became a multi-millionaire. She then lost her fortune, her marriage and a healthy relationship with her surviving children as she spiralled into binge drinking.

programme.title: Intervention
programme.desc: Sierra was an honour student, but when a double-dealing artist charmed his way into her mother's life, he gambled away their home and the bottom fell out of Sierra's world.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent?
programme.desc: In the dead of night, a tattoo artist is shot in his home, and two informants identify a photojournalist as the shooter. The accused insists he has an alibi, but forensic evidence links him to the weapon.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A savvy poker player cleans up at the tables once at sea. But after she witnesses a man overboard, many begin to wonder if it was accidental or on purpose - and who could be next.

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives
programme.desc: Follows the investigation into the Halling Rapist and how familial DNA helped solve the crime for the Bloodline Detectives.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime
programme.desc: A family faces off with violent attackers trying to rob their jewellery store, two young women flee from a driver out to get them on a terrifying road trip, and convenience and crime collide at a bank ATM.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers, and a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Model and mother Samira Frasch loved the spotlight, but when her glamorous life ends unexpectedly in her mansion pool, investigators turn their eyes towards a web of heated relationships.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A scratch and win ticket unveils an all-expense paid cruise for a young couple. But their luck runs out once aboard the ship as one of them ends up murdered.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Cecil and Larlane Brown have been together for years. But their secrets and lies, ignored and neglected for decades, threaten to turn their 50-year relationship into a bloody battleground.

programme.title: My Lover My Killer
programme.desc: Tanveer Iqbal and Zatoon Bibi had an affair under the noses of their families. When he called it off, she vowed revenge.

programme.title: BTK: Confession Of A Serial Killer

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: Charming and smart, Henry tried to hide his dark side, fuelled by years of abuse and twisted fantasies, until his first murder. Then, bad Henry took over.

programme.title: I Survived
programme.desc: A heavily-armed teenager goes on a killing spree in a Salt Lake City shopping mall. Passengers and crew of a sinking cruise liner are forced to abandon ship in a ferocious storm in the Indian Ocean.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes
programme.desc: In Cleveland, a family is torn apart when a beloved uncle is killed by his own flesh and blood. In Tulsa, when a young man disappears and is believed to be dead, detectives face a family's code of silence.

programme.title: FUTUROPOLIS: Mapping the City of Tomorrow
programme.desc: By 2065, the waters surrounding the island where Singapore lays may be dramatically impacted. programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: The banner for Revs' Air show has disappeared. Where can it be ? Could someone be trying to spoil Revs' show? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland - just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.desc: Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa finds it really funny that all his friends come running every time he roars really loudly. programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2023 Upper Austria Ladies Linz (250)

programme.title: DP World eTour 2022
programme.desc: In partnership with the DP World Tour, golf's first esports proposition - the European eTour was launched. In this 3rd season, players go head-to-head in the leading online and mobile golf game, World Golf Tour (WGT) by Topgolf, which offers the most photorealistic golf gaming experience giving players the opportunity to virtually play some of the most famous golf championship courses.

programme.title: Breaking Golf's Greatest Myths
programme.desc: In Breaking Golf's Greatest Myths, world-class instructor Martin Chuck will take you through all facets of the game to reveal the truth about how to play better than ever.

programme.title: LPGA Tour 2023 Hilton Grand Vacations Tournament of Champions
programme.desc: The 2023 Tournament of Champions returns to the renowned championship golf course at Lake Nona Golf & Country Club in Orlando, featuring LPGA Tour winners playing alongside around 50 celebrities, athletes and entertainers in one of golf's most unique events.

programme.title: Playing Lessons 2022
programme.desc: You've seen how great players swing. But how do they think? What goes on inside their head that allows them to pull off those incredible shots? Discover the strategies and techniques that work for them on the big stage - and see what you can bring back to your own home course.

programme.title: DP World Tour 2023 Singapore Classic
programme.desc: For the first time since 2014, the DP World Tour returns to Singapore for the 2023 Singapore Classic. New Zealand's Ryan Fox is one of the top names fans can look forward to when the tournament tees off at the Laguna National Golf Resort Club.

programme.title: Rolex Challenge Tour Grand Final supported by The R&A
programme.desc: The Rolex Challenge Tour Grand Final supported by The R&A is the season-ending tour championship on the Challenge Tour, where the top 45 players on the Road to Mallorca Rankings will compete for one of 20 life changing DP World Tour cards for the 2023 season. Past Champions include the likes of Tommy Fleetwood, Edoardo Molinaro and Francesco Laporta.

programme.title: Asian Tour 2023 International Series Oman
programme.desc: The Asian Tour has added the International Series Oman to its 2023 International Series calendar. The tournament will be held in Al Mouj Golf, Muscat from February 9-12 and boast prize money of $2 million.

programme.title: Build a Better Game 2022
programme.desc: You don't need to be at the golf course to get better at golf, you can actually get better at home. In this series, Martin Chuck shows you how you can use everyday items around your home to work on every aspect of your game; from hitting longer drives to sinking more putts.

programme.title: Golf Central 2023
programme.desc: Keep up with everything that's happening in the world of golf. More than just scores, Golf Central delivers in-depth analysis, breaking news and unforgettable highlights. If it happens in golf, it happens on Golf Central.

programme.title: Pop-Up GOLF Clinic
programme.desc: After focusing to become one of the world's best wedge players, Rory McIlroy manged to clinch the 2022 FedExCup. He put on a clinic all about wedge play in Florida recently, and after watching this, you will be better equipped with the knowledge from inside the 100 yards.

programme.title: GOLF Films 2021
programme.desc: Golf Films is a franchise of films produced by Golf Channel, co-founded by golf legend Arnold Palmer. The Golf Films library covers a wide range of key figures and events that have changed the game in unique ways, in particular over the last century.

programme.title: Ask Como 2022
programme.desc: Chris Como describes the faults that can arise with a longer backswing and explains how to properly use the lower body to create more power without taking a longer swing.

programme.title: The Swing Gym 2023
programme.desc: There are many sides to golf, and several ways to pursue lower scores. World-renowned fitness coach Don Saladino walks you through a comprehensive program of specific exercises to help you address your most bothersome golf swing flaws.

programme.title: DP World Tour 2022 G4D Tour Series Finale
programme.desc: Catch the highlights as the inaugural G 4 D (Golf 4 the Disabled) Tour season reaches the exciting climax wth the top 8 golfers battling out to claim the ultimate prize in disabled golf

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy 2022
programme.desc: It's your chance to learn golf from some of the finest players to ever play the game. Their goal is to teach you the skills and strategies that help them do it!

programme.title: Private Lessons 2022
programme.desc: Have you ever wanted to be a fly on the wall during a golf lesson with one of the world's greatest golf instructors? Now's your chance. Smith and The Miz.

programme.desc: The Asian Tour travels to King Abdullah Economic City, Saudi Arabia, for the 2023 PIF Saudi International. Taking place at Royal Greens Golf and Country Club, this tournament boasts a prize purse of US$5 million.

programme.desc: The Legends Tour, formerly known as the European Senior Tour, is a men's professional golf tour for members aged 50 and older. Many of the pioneering champions who played on the European Tour during the 1970s, 80s and 90s make up the Legends Tour's active membership.

programme.title: School of Golf 2022

programme.title: Secret Royal Inspector & Joy
programme.desc: Set in Joseon dynasty, it tells the story of a young gourmet chef Ra Ian (Ok Taec Yeon) who unintentionally becomes a royal inspector and teams up with a a passionate realist woman Kim Joy to investigate and expose corrupt politicians.

programme.title: Palace of Devotion
programme.desc: Orphan Liu E (Tamia Liu) travels to the capital and catches the eye of Zhao Heng (Vic Chou) whom later rises to throne. She is perceptive to state affairs and discussed politics with him. Eventually, she takes charge of the country after he passes.

programme.title: Thank You Doctor

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.desc: Under the leadership of Dr Yeung (Roger Kwok), the director of Marshall Paxton Hospital and Dr Tong (Kenneth Ma), the vice-president, the sequel tells the story of the departments of neurosurgery, cardiothoracic, and emergency saving lives!

programme.desc: Sim Jaebok always believed that she has lived life to the full. However, her husband ends up cheating on her. What's worse, her benefactor stabs her in the back. Things are closing in on her, but she's not the type of person who gives up. Find out how she comes up against the harsh reality of life!

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to a new country, South Korea, for reasons such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society are unfolded!

programme.title: Naeil's Cantabile
programme.desc: A classical music-themed romance drama. An arrogant top student at a college of music falls in love with an eccentric but energetic pianist, and the two seemingly opposites make each other's life complete.

programme.title: The Return of Superman Encore
programme.desc: Witness the parenting challenges of "Superman", the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: The Love in Your Eyes
programme.desc: A troublesome daughter-in-law appears at a 30-year-old traditional beef bone soup restaurant. The story tells about Yeongi's second love as a single mom who says what she has to say no matter what, and about families with untold stories.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: This drama tells the story of a woman who became her enemy's daughter-in-law for desperate revenge.

programme.title: Queen For Seven Days
programme.desc: Queen Dangyeong was on throne for just seven days because of her political rivals who forcibly expelled her from the palace. The king, missing his queen, is said to have looked up at the mountain every single day. They spend the rest of their lives longing for each other.

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.

programme.title: Ms. Perfect
programme.desc: Sim Jaebok always believed that she has lived life to the full. However, her husband ends up cheating on her. What's worse, her benefactor stabs her in the back. Things are closing in on her, but she's not the type of person who gives up. Find out how she comes up against the harsh reality of life!

programme.title: Movie - Sayra Narasimma Reddy
programme.desc: Ten years before the Sepoy Mutiny, Emperor Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy of the Rayalaseema region fights the British East India Company in order to put an end to their atrocities.

programme.title: Movie - Iravukku Aayiram Kangal
programme.desc: A cab driver finds himself in a tough spot after he is suspected of a murder. Multiple stories unfold while he tries to prove himself innocent.

programme.title: Movie - Paarthanabagam Illayo
programme.desc: Twin sisters separated at birth are raised differently. Confusion ensues years later when they are mistaken to be each other.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhalagi
programme.desc: Nandhini and Thyagu, two childhood friends from different castes, fall in love with each other. However, when Raja discovers their relationship and kills her, her friends set out to seek justice.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Ooty
programme.desc: Balu and Charu love each other, but Balu's uncle's daughter Ria gets pregnant with her classmate's child. Being devoted to his uncle, Balu decides to take the blame and marry Ria.

programme.title: Movie - Ranga
programme.desc: Ranga, who was once a nice man, plans to kidnap a young boy while Raju, a former crook, decides to protect him. However, things change when their shared past is revealed.

programme.title: Movie - Vanchinathan
programme.desc: A cop who can go to any means to arrest a criminal is challenged by a popular newspaper owner who always prints chaotic news. He is the eye witness to the murder done by the newspaper owner, but he cannot prove it.

programme.title: Movie - Ninaivirukkum Varai
programme.desc: Jani falls in love with Sandhya but does not express his love for fear of losing her friendship. But he tries to break up her marriage when he learns a shocking truth about her groom.

programme.title: Movie - Naattamai
programme.desc: A wealthy man is known and revered for his just nature all over the region. His brother is married to an arrogant girl while there are others who are continuously plotting against this family.

programme.title: Movie - Aravaan
programme.desc: Kombodhi is the leader of a tribe who steals from the rich to survive. He befriends Varupuli, who unknown to Kombodhi is a man who escaped from being sacrificed and is being hunted by his village.

programme.title: Movie - Thayamma
programme.desc: Pandiyan, Anand and Babu are friends who live in the same apartment. One day, they are shocked to find a child at their doorstep as it does not belong to any of them.

programme.title: Movie - Thaai Naadu
programme.desc: Thaai Naadu is a 1997 Tamil film directed by H. R. Bhargava and produced by S. Shankar. The film stars Vishnuvardhan, B. Saroja Devi, Srikanya and Geethanjali in the lead roles, with musical score by Rajan-Nagendra.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Malaiyan
programme.desc: Malayan works in a fireworks factory and is fiercely loyal to his boss. When their main competitor and his son cause a disastrous explosion in their warehouse, Malayan vows to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Movie - Pagal Nilavu
programme.desc: Selvam is indebted to Devarajan, a big shot in town, for saving his mother. When he falls in love with the sister of the new police inspector, Devarajan plans to make good use of the situation.

programme.title: Movie - Per Sollum Pillai
programme.desc: Rajalakshmi raises Ramu, an orphan, as her own son who in turn always protects his foster family. However, he must stop his malicious foster brothers from marrying off their real sister to a gangster.

programme.title: Movie - Kaadhal Mannan
programme.desc: Shiva, a mechanic, goes to Delhi to deliver a letter to Thilothama that is from her sister. However, Shiva falls in love with her, but Thilothama, though she reciprocates, cannot express her feelings.

programme.title: Movie - Dharma Puri
programme.desc: A rich landlord forces Sivaram's father, an honest hardworking man, to leave the village. However years later, the villagers beg Sivaraman to save them from the cruel landlord and his sons.
